bug.author: will-am
bug.summary: Priorbox layer fails to combine min_size and aspect_ratio when multiple min_size provided
bug.description: The current priorbox layer in v2 fails to enumerate all the combinations of min_size and aspect_ration when multiple values in min_size array are provided: paddle/gserver/layers/PriorBox.cpp : <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32189592/35151721-68a97ba4-fd5a-11e7-9488-4c959bfbedca.png></denchmark-link>
